statements: DELETE FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE vehicle_id = 1 AND date = '2021-10-15';
DELETE FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE miles_driven > 500 AND fuel_amount < 50.0;
DELETE FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE vehicle_id = 1 AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
DELETE FROM fuel_consumption_data WHERE miles_driven > 500 OR fuel_amount < 20;
DELETE FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota' AND fuel_capacity < 90
DELETE FROM fuel_logs WHERE log_date < '2022-01-01' AND fuel_amount < 50;
DELETE FROM fuel_stations WHERE station_location = 'New York';
